column2: # Here render a table for the DALY burden over time for the three countries.
# You should pivot the data wider to show each country in a separate column.
select(Year, Entity, `DALYs (Disability-Adjusted Life Years) - Non-communicable diseases - Sex: Both - Age: Age-standardized (Rate)`) %>%
values_from = `DALYs (Disability-Adjusted Life Years) - Non-communicable diseases - Sex: Both - Age: Age-standardized (Rate)`)
# Use kable() from the knitr package to render the table.
kable(data_ncd_wide, caption = "DALY Burden Over Time for Selected Countries")
